Trade/Device Name(s): APAS Independence with IC MRSA Chromogenic BD Analysis Module
APAS Independence with IC MRSA Chromogenic TFS/S Analysis Module
Regulation Name(s): Automated Image Assessment System For Microbial Colonies On Solid Culture Media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for APAS Independence system with IC MRSA Chromogenic BD and TFS/S Analysis Modules for automated screening of MRSA colonies from anterior nares swabs using chromogenic agars
Indications for Use Summary: Automates imaging and interpretation of culture plates inoculated with anterior nares swabs to aid in routine screening for MRSA colonization; BD module provides Presumptive MRSA or Negative, TFS/S module provides Presumptive MRSA, Presumptive non-MRSA, or Negative, with flagged positives requiring review by a microbiologist
